author: cms-sw
body:
* Added in this commit: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/commit/32b1cc4036fad9513622ec526c49829c20a54fae
* spec file not updated since then (8 years)
* All other packages added by that commit are already gone
* No references to fitsio in main cmssw repo
* Not in `cmssw-tool-conf.spec`
title: Drop fitsio spec
